conbody.title: Inventory of Furniture in Tracy's House

section.title: Main Level
Living Room
section.li: 2 Chairs, 1 Endtable, 1 Coffee Table, 1 Sofa Table, 4 Lamps, 1 Sofa, 1 Footstool

br.title: Sun Room
br.li: 2 Chairs, 2 Endtables, 1 Desk, 1 Marble Top Table, 2 Lamps, 1 Sofa, 1 Footstool

Bedroom 1
section.li: 1 Chair, 1 Full Bed, 1 Large Bureau, 1 Small Bureau, 2 Lamps, 2 End Tables

br.title: Bedroom 2

br.title: Bedroom 3
br.li: 2 Chairs, 1 King Bed, 1 Man’s Bureau, 1 Woman’s Bureau, 4 Lamps, 3 End Tables, 1 Desk, 1 Desk Chair, 1 Bookshelf
